text: The Stranger is a 1946 American psychological mystery thriller movie directed by Orson Welles (who also stars in it) and also starring Edward G. Robinson, Loretta Young, Philip Merivale, Konstantin Shayne, Byron Keith, Billy House, Martha Wentworth. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 mystery movies Category:1946 thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Orson Welles
title: The Stranger (1946 movie)
